opencard.opt.netscape

Class NetscapeSystemAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • opencard.core.util.SystemAccess
      • opencard.opt.netscape.NetscapeSystemAccess

  • public class NetscapeSystemAccess
extends SystemAccess
    Singleton that provides access to protected system resources like file I/O, properties, native code under Netscape browsers. Thread safe: each thread can only access its own SystemAccess class.
    To run OpenCard under a Microsoft browser install the browser specific SystemAccess class in the applets init() method as follows:
    opencard.core.util.SystemAccess sys = opencard.opt.netscape.NetscapeSystemAccess(); opencard.core.util.SystemAccess.setSystemAccess(sys);
    Version:
    $Id: NetscapeSystemAccess.java,v 1.1.1.1 1999/10/05 15:08:47 damke Exp $
    Author:
    Peter Bendel (peter_bendel@de.bm.com)
    See Also:
    SystemAccess, MicrosoftSystemAccess
